content: The team has put forward a strategy to engage stakeholders like unbanked individuals, traditional financial institutions, local businesses, international institutions, women's rights organizations, and government agencies overseeing the banking sector. They have emphasized the significance of establishing trust within the community, partnering with local organizations, and developing a strong brand campaign. However, the team could have provided a more in-depth analysis of relevant feedback loops and incentive issues to fully grasp the implications of their proposed solutions.
